resources.string: Select the part of the body

To search injury should click on search icon located in the upper right corner or open the menu (svaypom from right) and select "Show all injuries." To see injuries that relate to a specific part of the body should click on this part of the body of the soldier in the picture or choose from the list by clicking on the field "Select part of the body," which is located above the image of a soldier. To see some first aid for injuries should click on its name.

Students of IS-52s:
